resources.string: CREATE TABLE netprofile (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, jitter INTEGER, loss INTEGER, udp TEXT, tcp TEXT, down TEXT, up TEXT, network_type TEXT, endpoint_type TEXT, date DATETIME NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE user (id TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE )
CREATE TABLE t_methoddata (methodid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, methodname TEXT, classname TEXT, methodcount INTEGER DEFAULT 1, methodhash INTEGER)

CREATE TABLE t_localexecutiondata (executionid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, methodid INTEGER, inputsize INTEGER, outputsize INTEGER, serverurl TEXT, conntype INTEGER, executiondate DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, executiontime INTEGER, executiondecision INTEGER)

CREATE TABLE t_remoteexecutiondata (executionid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, methodid INTEGER, inputsize INTEGER, outputsize INTEGER, serverurl TEXT, conntype INTEGER, executiondate DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, executiontime INTEGER, executiondecision INTEGER)

CREATE TABLE t_thresholddata ( thresholdid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, methodid INTEGER, serverurl TEXT, conntype INTEGER, unfavmin INTEGER, unfavmax INTEGER, favmin INTEGER, favmax INTEGER)

CREATE TABLE t_functiondata (functionid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, methodid INTEGER, serverurl TEXT, conntype INTEGER, sumx INTEGER, sumy INTEGER, sumxy INTEGER, sumsqrx INTEGER, factora REAL, factorb REAL)
